required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Genetics Study of Wet Age-Related Macular Degeneration (AMD) Non-Responders to Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor (VEGF) Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: Genotypic Evaluation of Chronic Exudative Macular Degeneration Despite Monthly Anti-Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor (VEGF) Therapy

lead_sponsor.agency: West Coast Retina Medical Group, Inc.

clinical_study.source: West Coast Retina Medical Group, Inc.

brief_summary.textblock: To obtain a genotypic analysis of patients with chronic exudative age-related macular degeneration noted to have subretinal or intraretinal edema despite continuous monthly Anti-VEGF therapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Genetic analysis of patients with chronic wet age-related macular degeneration despite continuous anti-VEGF treatment
primary_outcome.time_frame: This is a one time only blood draw.

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate demographic and clinical characteristics in patients treated with anti-VEGF therapy who fail to respond completely.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: This is a one time only blood draw and assessment of clinical characteristics.

study_pop.textblock: Patients diagnosed with Wet Age-Related Macular Degeneration

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Ability to provide written informed consent for participation in this study
- Subjects diagnoses of neovascular AMD who are on a monthly anti-VEGF regimen (have had >10 or more ranibizumab and/or bevacizumab injections within the last year) and who still have intra-retinal or subretinal fluid as confirmed by the Investigator
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with a Pigment Epithelial Detachment Exclusively
- Subjects with Serous Pigment Epithelial Detachments
- Subjects with history of the following:
idiopathic polypoidal choroidal vasculopathy
- pathologic degenerative myopia
- central serous chorioretinopathy
- familial drusen
- adult onset foveal pattern dystrophy

facility.name: West Coast Retina Medical Group, Inc.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: West Coast Retina Medical Group, Inc.

clinical_study.keyword: Genetic analysis of patients with Wet AMD who have not responded fully to anti-VEGF treatments
